My Portfolio

Check out some of my projects.

Deployed web applications

Freelance Panel
React, Redux, Firebase, Firestore, CSS3, Bootstrap

This application was built to keep a client list organized. Each added client has a running balance along with their personal details.

Dog Sitter
Node.js, Express, HTML5, CSS3, Mustache

This app connects dog sitters and dog owners. The app allows for a dog sitter or a dog owner to create an account. Dog owners and dog sitters have different auth privileges. It's a fully CRUD built application.

Butikk-Liste
React, Express, Node.js, Reactstrap

This app is simple on the outside but robust on the inside. The application will continue to be added onto and improved. The app is built with React,Express and calls to a database.

Designed Sites

UI Concepts for various sites/apps

Multi-Tab Portfolio
HTML, CSS3, Bootstrap

Multi-Tab is a clean professional portfolio site. The single page multi tabbed layout allows for a viewer to navigate quickly throughout the site.

Mukduk
HTML, CSS3, Materialize

Mukduk is a bright single page layout utilizing open space with the indent to display information for any business.

Verkoyet Admin-Panel
HTML, CSS3, Materialize, Canvas.js, jQuery

Verkoyet is an admin panel that can serve as the layout for a new CMS. The concept is a layout that can be used to track website data. It displays visits, comments posts and users that have used the page.

Sikkerhet Landing-Page
HTML, CSS3, Materialize

This site is large full width business style page. As the user scrolls down, the nav sticks to the top. The page uses google maps to display its contact form.
